spell.refined_mod.frost_strike.guide: Imbue your weapon with Ice and Frost in a sweeping strike. The damage scales off of your held weapon's melee damage.
spell.refined_mod.thunder_strike.guide: Call down a bolt of Lightning with your armament. The damage scales off of your held weapon's melee damage and enchantments.
spell.refined_mod.moon_slash.guide: Summon a Sweeping wave of moonlight that emits from the players armament
spell.refined_mod.summon_wolves.guide: Cast to summon a pack of loyal wolves who will follow and protect you
effect.refined_mod.wolf_timer.descriptio: Displays the duration remaining on your summons, and their count
